labels.name: AI

labels.description: Community growth, events, contributor experience, support programs.

labels.description: Workflow, approvals, localization, archiving, content governance.

labels.description: Extensibility, hooks, configuration for bespoke needs, in particular admin extensibility.

labels.name: headless
labels.description: API-first headless delivery, full-stack frontend frameworks integrations.

labels.name: media
labels.description: Images, documents, other media types, asset management, storage pipelines.

labels.name: needs contributions
labels.description: Open for community help; looking for contributors to deliver.

labels.name: needs sponsorship
labels.description: Work that requires funding or external sponsorship to progress.

labels.name: outreach
labels.description: Community outreach, communications, adoption initiatives.

labels.name: performance
labels.description: Speed of admin or frontend; profiling, caching, query tuning, perceived performance.

labels.name: scale
labels.description: High-traffic, multi-site, large content sets, reliability at scale.

labels.name: search
labels.description: Search UX, indexing: query, ranking, Elasticsearch and database search integrations.

labels.name: security
labels.description: Security hardening, authentication, permissions, threat mitigation, vulnerabilities management.

labels.name: sponsored
labels.description: Work funded by sponsors; going ahead thanks to their support.

labels.name: sustainability
labels.description: Digital sustainability, eco design, carbon footprint, energy use, climate impact.

labels.name: tech debt

labels.name: UX
